casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jessie HAYES, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Donyelle Michael Black, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jemal Tipton, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157813, SC: 157814, SC: 157815
COA: 339543, COA: 339544, COA: 339547 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motions of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their replies are GRANTED. The replies will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 28, 2018.
